events.message: I received my order yesterday but the device has a noticeable scratch on the screen and it doesn't power on properly.
The reported problem includes a scratch and malfunctioning power, categorizing this as a product defect issue.
An agent specialized in product defects has been assigned to assist with the case regarding the damaged item.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the scratch and power issue on your device. Let me help you resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratch and confirm if you have tried charging the device with a different cable or outlet?
I’ve attached clear photos of the scratch. I tried charging it with two cables and outlets, but it still won’t turn on.
Thank you for the details. We can offer you a replacement device shipped within two business days or a full refund if you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement device. Thank you for the quick response and helpful options.
We’ve processed the replacement order and you will receive a tracking number shortly. Please keep the damaged item until the replacement arrives.
Just checking in to confirm that your replacement device arrived and is working fine. Let us know if you need any further assistance.
The replacement arrived today and works perfectly! Thank you very much for your support and quick handling of this issue.
We are glad everything is resolved. Closing this case now, and feel free to contact us again anytime you need help.
